review:
Dr. Aishwariya has been a true blessing for my wife's health. Her exceptional expertise and warm, friendly approach make her stand out as a remarkable gynecologist.

From the first appointment, Dr. Aishwariya has demonstrated a deep commitment to providing top-notch care. Her medical proficiency is evident, and she ensures my wife is comfortable and informed throughout every visit.

What truly sets Dr. Aishwariya apart is her genuine friendliness and caring nature. She creates a safe and open environment for my wife to discuss her concerns, fostering trust and a strong patient-doctor bond.

Dr. Aishwariya takes the time to educate and empower her patients, going beyond medical care to improve overall well-being. She follows up on progress and is always accessible for questions.

In short, Dr. Aishwariya is a remarkable gynecologist who combines expertise with a caring, friendly approach. We wholeheartedly recommend her to anyone seeking top-notch women's healthcare from a truly exceptional and supportive doctor. She's a valuable asset to our healthcare journey.

i visited Dr Aishwarya for pco problem. she is very good and she knows what she is doing. i will recommend her for all. especially for ppl like me who has lots of doubts. jus meet her once for your gynaec problems and then you will understand why i recommand her

Dr Aishwarya is very good.  wonderful woman. this is my first pregnancy. i was very scared because this is a precious baby for us.  i can approach her whenever i want. she did normal delivery for me. she waited patiently to do normal delivery. big thanks to her.

******* **** ******* ** ******* *** **** ***** **** **** ********** Didn't deliver rest reports on time even after multiple reminders.

She gave a medicine worth 3k  for a ***** infection. Patient was not able to sleep or even walk properly 

* ***** **** *** *** ** *** ** *** **** ***** ******

I had uterus problem and severe pain. so I visited Dr Aishwarya in Aval women Care. she was very kind. she diagnosed my problem. i underwent total laparoscopic hysterectomy with dr Aishwarya. She was there for me throughout. i had few other complications but she really took good care, her treatment was very professional and she has a very good team. im so thankful for finding a nice doctor like her. god bless you.

Doctor made sure to make me feel comfortable and she reassured me that my issue is curable and that I need not worry at all.  I really appreciate the doctor and the clinic for making sure that the patient's comfort is most important and that the patient need not worry about whatever it is. The staff was friendly too. I was very nervous to go in but she my mind at rest and guided me.
Good approach. She explained clearly what was the exact issue And prescribed medicines for the cure. I recomend this doctor for these types of health issue
Her way of counseling & Doubt clarification has been very Supportive for us. Feeling secured after consultation.
